channel.title: 小技巧 on Gavin's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in 小技巧 on Gavin's Blog

item.title: Golang Tips
item.description: 关于select case runtime.GOMAXPROCS(1) int_chan := make(chan int, 1) string_chan := make(chan string, 1) int_chan <- 1 string_chan <- "hello" select { case value := <-string_chan: fmt.Println(value) case value := <-int_chan: panic(value) } 上面代码两个case都满足，会伪随机的执行一个 关于defer func DeferCalc() { a := 1 b := 2 defer calc("1", a, calc("10", a, b)) a = 0 defer calc("2", a, calc("20", a, b)) b = 1 time.Sleep(1 * time.Second) } func calc(index string, a, b int) int { ret := a + b fmt.
